links.title: Forget Google Glass - these are the smart glasses you actually want to wear
links.description: If you are a fan of smart glasses but were disappointed with the Google Glass, Vuzix's new smart glasses may be your new favourite gadget of 2018. Vuzix has been developing its smart glasses since before Google began working on its Glass product, and has finally released a pair of spectacles which excel in the areas Google Glass fell short.

links.title: iPhone lines were shorter this year, though that might not mean much for Apple
links.description: Waiting in line for an iPhone doesn't seem to hold the allure it once did, but a dwindling band of analysts still camp out with Apple Inc.'s superfans and try to glean insight from their presence and preferences.

messages.body: $AAPL https://www.zerohedge.com/news/2018-09-22/latest-iphones-greeted-abysmal-demand-china

links.title: Latest iPhones Greeted With Abysmal Demand In China
links.description: Apple's latest - and disappointing - iPhone product unveiling also revealed the two biggest headaches troubling CEO Tim Cook today: first is the lack of a new "must have" gadget (Apple watch EKG aside), with the iPhone failing to impress the faithful for the second year in a row, and prompting sellside analysts to conclude that for one more year there won't be a "must have" iPhone supercycle.
